titles.title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, relating to drug testing of individuals applying for drivers' licenses.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.
Executive Comment Requested from DOT, OMB.

bill.summary: 6/24/1987--Introduced. Mandates that certain Federal-aid highway apportionments be withheld from a State unless it requires first-time driver's license applicants to submit to a urinalysis for detection of controlled substances. Sets forth a formula for the withholding of apportionments.
